name: Jump Fit - Shape Matching Game
description:
Tap when the shape is inside the dotted line.

Jump Fit is a fun, fast and beautiful game. It's quick fun and addictive.
Do you think you can progress through the levels? What about getting all perfect fits in the entire level?

The better your fit, the most points you will make. Aim for Perfect Fits and you will get high scores like never before.

Explore hundreds of leves with a number of challenging shape combinations to trick your brain and test your shape fitting skills.

Each geometric shape will have a different gameplay. They might go sideways, up, down, diagonally. Who knows?! Be fast and pay attention to your screen.

Play Jump Fit NOW!
publishers: Clap Clap Desenvolvimento de Jogos Ltda ME
